summary:
"Baby Driver" is an action movie from 2017, directed by Edgar Wright. It's about a young getaway driver, Baby (Ansel Elgort), who wants to escape his criminal life with his girlfriend, Debora (Lily James). The film features cool car chases, stunts, and a great soundtrack.

Wright worked on this movie for a long time, and it was shot in Atlanta. It got mostly good reviews and made a lot of money. People liked the action and music, but some critics didn't love the story. It even got nominated for big awards like the Oscars and Golden Globes.
title: Baby Driver
